Class UtcOffset

  • java.lang.Object

extends Object
    Represents a UTC offset.

    Michael Angstadt

    • Constructor Detail

      • UtcOffset

        public UtcOffset(boolean positive,
         int hour,
         int minute)
        Parameters:
        positive - true if the offset is positive, false if it is negative
        hour - the hour component of the offset (the sign of this integer is ignored)
        minute - the minute component of the offset (the sign of this integer is ignored)

      • UtcOffset

        public UtcOffset(long millis)
        Parameters:
        millis - the offset in milliseconds

    • Method Detail

      • parse

        public static UtcOffset parse(String text)
        Parses a UTC offset from a string.
        Parameters:
        text - the text to parse (e.g. "-0500")
        Returns:
        the parsed UTC offset
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the text cannot be parsed

        Returns:

      • toString

        public String toString(boolean extended)
        Converts this offset to its ISO string representation.
        Parameters:
        extended - true to use extended format (e.g. "-05:00"), false to use basic format (e.g. "-0500")
        Returns:
        the ISO string representation
